001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003/**
004 * IO strategies available to RADAR pipelines.
005 *
006 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
007 */
008public enum IoMode {
009  /** File-system backed IO. */
010  FILE,
011  /** Apache Kafka backed IO. */
012  KAFKA;
013
014  /**
015   * Parses a string into an {@link IoMode}, defaulting to {@link #FILE} when blank.
016   *
017   * @param value textual representation such as {@code "file"} or {@code "kafka"}
018   * @return parsed mode
019   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the string does not match a known mode
020   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
021   */
022  public static IoMode fromString(String value) {
023    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
024      return FILE;
025    }
026    try {
027      return IoMode.valueOf(value.trim().toUpperCase());
028    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
029      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ioMode: " + value);
030    }
031  }
032}
